title: Inception
description: First team registered, cleared virtuals but did not participate in the event.

title: SAE Effi-cycle
description: Successfully participated in the 2014 virtual round hosted at RIT Chennai on 28-29 June 2014.

title: Car #113
description:
- First team from Saintgits to clear external technical evaluation and qualify for the main event.
- First team to clear Technical Inspection and virtuals to participate in the final race.

title: Car #40
description:
- Achieved significant weight reduction from 325kg to 239.5kg.
- Placement: Sandip M Jayram placed at Endurance Technologies Ltd.

title: Car #89
description:
- Completed 11 laps in the endurance race and recorded the fastest acceleration time (6.49 seconds) among Kerala teams.
- First time achieving a kerb weight below 200 kg.

title: Car #83
description:
- SAE BAJA: Secured first prize in the SLED PULL event, marking the first podium finish for a Kerala team and received a cash prize of Rs 60,000.
- Placement: Team member placed at ELEATION.
- Overall first position in ATV Competition held in IHRD Adoor, where all BAJA teams from Kerala competed.

title: Car #57
description:
- Dynamic milestones: Shortest turning radius ever achieved and most oversteering Striderz buggy with aggressive steering and handling DNA.
- Achieved the lowest weight of roll cage: 174 kg.

title: Car #55
description:
- Cleared brake test on the first attempt.
- Completed the endurance race.
- Placements: Four members placed at Mahindra & Mahindra.

title: Car #103
description:
- Vision Board Challenge: Won the OC Choice Award.
- Only team from Kerala to pass Technical Inspection and participate in the endurance race.
- Achieved 2nd best in acceleration and braking (A.I.R).
- Completed maneuverability with a good score.

title: Car #51
description:
- M-Baja: Launched the first-ever four-wheel drive vehicle from Saintgits College.
- Cleared Technical Inspection, participated in all static and dynamic events, and finished the endurance race with a commendable record.
- Go Green Event: Achieved All India Rank 2 in phase 2.
- Placements: Two members placed at TVS Motors.

title: ATVC: Car #43
description: - Attained All India Rank 3 in the endurance race, won awards for Best Innovation, and received a cash prize of Rs 25,000. The buggy remained in pristine condition after the events.
